title: Read per capita meat consumption from graph

content.question: Which of the following statements is consistent with the graphs above?

choices.label: Per capita meat consumption in Africa will increase as the population in Africa increases.
North American meat production is expected to decrease as population increases.
Per capita meat consumption in Europe will decline because population in Europe is projected to decrease.
People in North America consume more meat per capita than people in other regions of the world do.
By 2050 Asia will have the greatest per capita meat consumption because Asia has the greatest projected increase in population.

content.answer: People in North America consume more meat per capita than people in other regions of the world do.

skill.text: Skill 5.C: Explain patterns and trends in data to draw conclusions.
